## AuthContainer.signupWithEmail() method

Sign up new user with email.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
signupWithEmail(email: string, password: string, options?: {
        metadata?: JSONObject;
    }): Promise<User>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  email | <code>string</code> |  |
|  password | <code>string</code> |  |
|  options | <code>{</code><br/><code>        metadata?: JSONObject;</code><br/><code>    }</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User>`

## Remarks

Equivalent to [AuthContainer.signup()](./web.authcontainer.signup.md)<!-- -->: `signup({"email": email}, password, options)`<!-- -->.
